original: @72a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: @72a * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: mdza' bo bdag la sdang na ma rungs par byed pa'i las ni dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la /
analyzed: mdza' bo bdag la sdang na ma rungs par byed pa'i las ni dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bris la /
translated: If one's friend is hostile, the rite of making him unwholesome is as follows: On cloth from a charnel ground, draw an eight-spoked wheel.

original: lte bar che ge mo m'a ra ya dza: zhes pa bri /
analyzed: lte bar che ge mo m'a ra ya dza: zhes pa bri /
translated: In the center, write so-and-so's māraya jaḥ.

original: rtsibs la khro bo lnga'i sngags bris la cho ga rdzogs par byas nas dur khrod du mnan na mdza' bo sdang ba ma rungs bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtsibs la khro bo lnga'i sngags bris la cho ga rdzogs par byas nas dur khrod du mnan na mdza' bo sdang ba ma rungs bar 'gyur ro //
translated: On the spokes, write the mantras of the five wrathful ones. Having completed the rite, if one suppresses [the wheel] in a charnel ground, the hostile friend will become unwholesome.

original: sdu gu bdag la sdang ba dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na /
analyzed: sdu gu bdag la sdang ba dbang du bsdu bar 'dod na /
translated: If one wishes to bring under one's control a hostile enemy,

original: snying po bsdus pa la stong phrag lnga bzlas la dpral bar tsandan gyis lcags kyu bri /
analyzed: snying po bsdus pa la stong phrag lnga bzlas la dpral bar tsandan gyis lcags kyu bri /
translated: one should recite the essence mantra five thousand times. On the forehead, draw a goad with sandalwood.

original: lag mthil du gi wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa re bris la /
analyzed: lag mthil du gi wang gis 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa re bris la /
translated: On the palm of the hand, draw with guggela a four-spoked wheel.

original: che ge mo'i nor dang bcas ba dbang du gyur cig sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas dbang du g'yru ro //
analyzed: che ge mo'i nor dang bcas ba dbang du gyur cig sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas dbang du g'yru ro //
translated: Recite May so-and-so's wealth come under my control svāhā. By saying that, [the enemy] will come under control.

original: skye bo gang sdang ba dur khrod du gsang pa'i sbyor ba lan bdun byas na 'chi bar nges so //
analyzed: skye bo gang sdang ba dur khrod du gsang pa'i sbyor ba lan bdun byas na 'chi bar nges so //
translated: If one does the secret practice seven times in a charnel ground against someone who hates one, they will certainly die.

original: sdang ba gsum gyi las thor bu slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: sdang ba gsum gyi las thor bu slob dpon ye shes rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The scattered rites of the three hates composed by the master Yeshe Dorje are complete.
